name: Bitcoin Typer
short_description:
To download Bitcoin Typer, please select the "View All Downloads" button.
There are two version for you:

Bitcoin Typer:  
    Solve captcha by yourself.
    Press "start" button, and captcha will pop up for you.
    Demo link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9MiYleAoxxs
    
Bitcoin Typer Pro:
    Solve captcha with 2Captcha service automatically.
    All need to do is enter your 2Captcha api key and bitcoin address.
    Demo link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=srkwZXGTTC8

Notice:
    Some faucet sites have to fill in some info when
    your address first claim. Therefore, please go to the 
    faucet sites do first claim yourself.

    Some faucet sites have to submit captcha first,
    then, you know that you can claim it or not.
    Therefore, captcha pop up not 100% mean to 
    you can claim the bitcoin. Just check the logger :)

Please ignore the browser and os warning
100% no ads, virus :)
You can scan it on VirusTotal.
https://www.virustotal.com/
summary: Bitcoin Typer - A Free Bitcoin Faucet Bot
